campaign_name: The Elder Scrolls: Skyrim - Fate Core Campaign (Insaerndel Timeline)
current_objective: Secure Imperial win in Battle of Whiterun; ensure Hadvar survives; trigger Greymane investigation fallout; protect Battle-Born Arcana foothold.

battle_of_whiterun_modifiers.source: Insaerndel eliminated Thalmor handler and escorts; burned evidence; disrupted Whiterun intelligence operations.
Secured contract with Olfrid Battle-Born; Writ of Privilege obtained; evacuation route established.
battle_of_whiterun_modifiers.expires: Until contract fulfilled or Battle-Born alliance broken
battle_of_whiterun_modifiers.note: Thieves Guild foothold leverage + Imperial defense support.

main_quest_state.timeline_notes: Campaign occurs after Alduin's defeat. Dragon crisis has ended, focus is on civil war and Thalmor conspiracy.

active_plots.description: Thalmor seeks to prolong civil war to weaken both sides

major_choices: Established Thieves Guild contract with House Battle-Born for 3,000g payment.
Received sealed Writ of Privilege from Olfrid Battle-Born, formalizing access and support.
Secured Battle-Born family evacuation route through Temple of Kyne.
Captured Thalmor ledger and successfully routed to Commander Irileth via guard chain-of-command.
Defended western gate; neutralized Stormcloak assault elements including spearman, charger, and sergeant.
Eliminated Thalmor handler and escorts behind Bannered Mare; burned evidence to neutralize intelligence node.
Witnessed 'For Greymane' illusion during Thalmor operation, creating political complication.
Accepted compel 'No Witnesses' for Thalmor elimination.
Secured western parapet; neutralized Stormcloak flanking attempt.

active_story_arcs.next_milestone: Complete Battle of Whiterun defense; deliver contract results to Olfrid
Complete final task to establish permanent Guild presence (4/5)
Manage fallout from Whiterun node neutralization; track Thalmor search (1/8)

companions.notes: Insaerndel operates solo as Thieves Guild operative.

starting_narrative: Insaerndel, a Thieves Guild operative, arrives in Whiterun with a mission to establish a permanent Guild foothold. As the Battle of Whiterun erupts with Stormcloak forces assaulting the city, Insaerndel leverages the chaos to secure contracts with House Battle-Born and neutralize Thalmor intelligence operations, all while defending the western gate for the Imperials.

pc_insaerndel.line: Recognized Insaerndel under siege conditions; accepted ledger handoff via chain-of-command; acknowledged information warfare value.

dragonbreak_note: This campaign represents a parallel timeline to the Khagar Yal (Stormcloak) campaign. Both occur during the Battle of Whiterun but from opposing perspectives. See logs/dragonbreak_log.md for documentation of this timeline split.
